about_the_game:
Enter Sock It, the almost wholly solo developed, zany Punch-Out-May-Cry-like with fleshed out opponents, platforming, and cutscenes! Each boss has various special attacks, and adds new nuance to the combat puzzle over the course of the game. Beware - they all have tricks up their sleeves! If they have sleeves that is. Cutscenes and platforming stages break up the action - this is no pure boss rush!


Alpha Piston, the greatest boxer of all time, has no memory, and lost his arms. Awakened hundreds of years into the future, and sporting some new robotic prosthetics, he must figure out what happened that fateful night while also fending off a morph suit murderer and dealing with a strange squatter, trying to rip him off of an apartment he thought he owned!

Why is Clance trying to kill him?

Is Ashley really that bad?

What is the DEAL with that duck hat!!!???



  • Box more than 12 crazy bosses! You'll never know what comes next. Fight aliens, magicians, and the undead!
  • Intense combo system encourages mastery of play. Will you get the S ranks?
  • Different attacks from opponents are dealt with differently. Dodge yellow attacks, parry red, and don't punch blue!
  • Platforming stages break up the action! Spectacle to the max!
  • Humorous cutscenes will steal your heart and your hard-earned cash!
  • A dozen title defense fights! Every fight in the game has a special challenge tailor made for it!

Enter Sock It, the almost wholly solo developed, zany Punch-Out-May-Cry-like with fleshed out opponents, platforming, and cutscenes! Each boss has various special attacks, and adds new nuance to the combat puzzle over the course of the game. Beware - they all have tricks up their sleeves! If they have sleeves that is. Cutscenes and platforming stages break up the action - this is no pure boss rush!


Alpha Piston, the greatest boxer of all time, has no memory, and lost his arms. Awakened hundreds of years into the future, and sporting some new robotic prosthetics, he must figure out what happened that fateful night while also fending off a morph suit murderer and dealing with a strange squatter, trying to rip him off of an apartment he thought he owned!

Why is Clance trying to kill him?

What is the DEAL with that duck hat!!!???

  • Platforming stages break up the action! Spectacle to the max!

  • A dozen title defense fights! Every fight in the game has a special challenge tailor made for it!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and newer recommended
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS recommened
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 12 Monterey
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only

name: Sock It

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only

short_description: Enter Sock It, the zany Punch-Out-May-Cry-like with fleshed out opponents, platforming, and cutscenes! Spar off with more than 12 bosses! Follow the story of a cryofrozen amputee boxer who needs to find his past! Encounter a stupid assassin, a greedy squatter, and a secret scheme!
